headline: PTC Inc. (PTC) Surpasses Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: PTC Inc. (PTC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 29.71% and 4.62%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: PTC (NASDAQ:PTC) Beats Q1 Sales Targets But Quarterly Revenue Guidance Significantly Misses Expectations
summary: Engineering and design software provider PTC (NASDAQ:PTC) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 5.5% year on year to $636.4 million. Revenue guidance for the full year exceeded analysts’ estimates, but next quarter’s guidance of $580 million was less impressive, coming in 5.5% below expectations. Its GAAP profit of $1.35 per share was 48.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: PTC Inc.: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: BOSTON (AP) — PTC Inc. PTC) on Wednesday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $162.6 million. The Boston-based company said it had net income of $1.35 per share.

headline: PTC and Schaeffler Expand Strategic Relationship with Adoption of Windchill+ PLM
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that Schaeffler, a leading motion technology company, will adopt PTC's Windchill+® product lifecycle management (PLM) solution as it continues modernizing its product development practices and working to accelerate time to market. As part of a broader cloud-driven transformation effort, Schaeffler is transitioning from its on-premises Windchill® environment to a cloud-based Windchill+ environment to unlock speed of deployment, upgrade, and collaboration benefits

As part of a broader cloud-driven transformation effort, Schaeffler is transitioning from its on-premises Windchill® environment to a cloud-based Windchill+ environment to unlock speed of deployment, upgrade, and collaboration benefits
